item.description: I saw The Kills when they were here with The Horrors two years ago, and I'm excited to see that they're coming back. The Kills' music is rooted in dirty, bluesy rock and a fair amount of vice, and while their music has become more melodic and beat-oriented as of late, they still bring an explosive, sexy chemistry to the stage, one that just feels like pure rock and roll. And I think we can all agree that Alison Mossheart (also of The Dead Weather) is one hell of a bad-ass rock singer. I'm definitely going to be at this one. Tickets are $18 advance, $20 at the door, and doors are at 7.
item.name: The Kills w/ Cold Cave, The Entrance Band @ Royale
